seriesJson.title: Music now
seriesJson.description: A series focused on American composers of the mid-Twentieth century.

node.title: Vincent Persichetti
node.description: The ninth and final episode of the series includes a  discussion and complete performance of the Third String Quartet, Opus 81 by Vincent Persichetti.

node.title: Harold Schiffman and Karl Kroeger
node.description: The sixth episode of this series focuses on the music of Harold Schiffman and Karl Kroeger.

node.title: Newton Strandberg and Theodore Snyder
node.description: The fourth episode of this series focuses on the music of Newton Strandberg and Theodore Snyder.

node.title: Johan Franco and Roy Henry Johnson
node.description: The fifth episode of this series focuses on the music of Johan Franco and Roy Henry Johnson

node.title: Margaret Fairlie and Sydney Hodkinson
node.description: The seventh episode of this series focuses on the music of Margaret Fairlie and Sydney Hodkinson.
